mpoly 1.1.1.900

Swap polynomial indeterminates

Source: R/swap.R
swap.Rd

Swap polynomial indeterminates

swap(p, variable, replacement)

Arguments

p

polynomial
variable

the variable in the polynomial to replace
replacement

the replacement variable

Value

a mpoly object

Examples


(p <- mp("(x + y)^2"))
#> x^2  +  2 x y  +  y^2
swap(p, "x", "t")
#> t^2  +  2 t y  +  y^2

## the meta data is retained
(p <- bernstein(3, 5))
#> 10 x^3  -  20 x^4  +  10 x^5
(p2 <- swap(p, "x", "t"))
#> 10 t^3  -  20 t^4  +  10 t^5
is.bernstein(p2)
#> [1] TRUE

(p <- chebyshev(3))
#> -3 x  +  4 x^3
(p2 <- swap(p, "x", "t"))
#> -3 t  +  4 t^3
is.chebyshev(p2)
#> [1] TRUE
